org.gvsig.educa.portableview.impl.compilation.process

Class CopyAllLayersFiles

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.gvsig.educa.portableview.impl.compilation.process.CopyAllLayersFiles
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProcessStep

    public class CopyAllLayersFiles
extends Object
implements ProcessStep

    PortableViewCompiler process step

    This steps copy all layer data into workFolder. This process is:

    • Creates root base folder in workFolder
    • Iterates over every layer:
      • If is a layer's group, create a new folder and iterates over its children
      • If is a layer, identify all files used by layer (data files,Symbology) and do:
        • Copy file to layer work folder
        • register final location of file in ProcessData.fileMapping

    From ProcessData Uses:

    • ProcessData.workFolder
    • ProcessData.mapContext
    and Sets:
    • ProcessData.fileMapping
    • ProcessData.mapContextFolder
    • ProcessData.rootLayersFolder
